description: Hey there, my name is Keziah and here are some stuff about me!

I am currently a student at the British Columbia Institute of Technology (BCIT), pursuing a diploma in the Computer Information Technology (CIT) program. With this diploma, I aspire to become a System Administrator and advance my interest in Cybersecurity!

hobbies: Reading Books! (currently on a Fantasy Genre Spree)

projects.name: VetVault (Pet Tracker)
description: A mini-project to track your furry friends or animals.
It also simulates Customer-Veterinarian communication to facilitate medicine for their animals.
Uses MySQL database where we incorporated triggers, and other functions.
Node.JS for backend, with login system as well.

projects.name: RemindlyProject
description: A reminder web application, where you can add, delete, and edit reminders.
Utilizes Node.JS and other node modules such as 'passport' and 'OAuth'.

projects.name: Subscription System
description: The aim is to have a subscription system working along with creating a working free trial.
Utilizes Google Cloud Project and its services to fully deploy the application.

githubContributions.description: My current activity and contributions on GitHub.
